unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions

Class FollowActionTerran_ScienceVessel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javaGOAP.GoapAction
      • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.BaseAction
        • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.FollowAction
          • unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions.FollowActionTerran_ScienceVessel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GroupableAction

    public class FollowActionTerran_ScienceVessel
extends FollowAction
    FollowActionTerran_ScienceVessel.java --- A follow action for PlayerUnitTerran_ScienceVessels with which the Unit is able to follow another one around. The Terran_Science_Vessel defines an order in which the existing Units are checked for compatibility. The executing Unit then performs this Action (= Follows the Unit) until it is in support range which in this Class is defined as the support pixel range of the PlayerUnitTerran_ScienceVessel Class.
    Author:
    P H - 23.09.2017
